inputs.name: path
inputs.description: The path to the OpenTofu root module directory.

inputs.name: workspace
inputs.description: The workspace to determine the OpenTofu version for.

inputs.name: backend_config
inputs.description:
List of OpenTofu backend config values, one per line.

This will be used to fetch the OpenTofu version set in the cloud workspace if using the `remote` backend.
For other backend types, this is used to fetch the version that most recently wrote to the OpenTofu state.

inputs.name: backend_config_file
inputs.description:
List of OpenTofu backend config files to use, one per line.
Paths should be relative to the GitHub Actions workspace

This will be used to fetch the OpenTofu version set in the cloud workspace if using the `remote` backend.
For other backend types, this is used to fetch the version that most recently wrote to the OpenTofu state.

outputs.name: terraform
outputs.description: The Hashicorp Terraform or OpenTofu version that is used by the configuration.

outputs.name: tofu
outputs.description: If the action chose a version of OpenTofu, this will be set to the version that is used by the configuration.
